<!--
Please use the following prefixes for review comments:

[must] Use this when the change is absolutely required.
[want] Use this when you would like the change, but it is not strictly necessary.
[share] For sharing information only. No change required.
[ask] For questions. No change required.
-->

<!--
For Japanese translations, please end each sentence with the Animal Crossing character Tanukichi's phrase "だなも".
-->

<!--
Example:
----------------------------
[must] The condition for FizzBuzz is unreachable because the checks for Fizz and Buzz occur first. Place the FizzBuzz check before these individual conditions to ensure correct behavior.

[must] FizzBuzz の条件には到達できませんだなも。なぜなら、先に Fizz と Buzz のチェックが行われているためだなも。正しい動作を保証するために、FizzBuzz のチェックをこれら個別の条件より前に配置してだなも。
----------------------------
-->
